label: Communication
comment: The exchange of thoughts, messages, or information, as universally exchanged by speech, signals, writing, or behaviour between persons and/or organizations.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the channel or manner in which a universal communication can be made, such as telephone or email.
The text string of characters that make up the complete number for this universal communication.
The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the email for this universal communication.

referencedBy.comment: The direct telephone communication information for this trade contact.
The exchange of thoughts, messages, or information, as universally exchanged by speech, signals, writing, or behaviour between persons and/or organizations.
An email Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) communication for this contact person.
The communication address of the end point URI for this trade party.
Facsimile communication information for this contact person.
An instant messaging communication for this contact person.
Landline telephone communication information for this transport person.
Mobile telephone communication information for this transport person.
A communication specified for this payment financial institution.
A telephone communication for this trade party.
Telegraphy (Telex) communication information for this trade contact.
A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) communication for this trade party, such as a web or email address.
A communication used by this trade contact.
Voice Over Internet Protocol (VOIP) communication information for this trade contact.
A website Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) communication for this contact person.
